Board.author: Bastiaan Verhoef (b.f.verhoef@student.utwente.nl)
Board.title: Maze
Board.description: Find your way out of the invisible maze
Board.prerequisite: Can use the keyboard arrow to move an object.
Board.goal: Help Tux get out of this maze.
Board.manual: Use the keyboard arrows to move Tux up to the door. Use the spacebar to switch between invisible and visible modes. Visible mode just gives you an indication of your position, like a map. You cannot move Tux in visible mode.
